Georgia State University: Georgia State University (Georgia State, State, or GSU) is a public research university in Atlanta, Georgia.[14] Founded in 1913, it is one of the University System of Georgia's four research universities. It is also the largest institution of higher education by enrollment based in Georgia and one of the largest in the nation with a student enrollment of around 50,000, including approximately 33,000 undergraduate and graduate students at the main campus downtown.[15]
